message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is a unique opportunity that we believe could significantly impact your business. We are offering the product for $950,000. We hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of your product, the price point is a bit high for me at the moment.  I'd be willing to consider purchasing it for $700,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, we would like to counter with a proposal of $825,000. This price reflects the value we place on the transaction and aims to provide a fair compromise. We look forward to your consideration.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. $825,000 is still a bit too high for my budget.  How about we meet in the middle at $762,500? This brings us closer to a deal.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. We understand your position and have decided to counter with an offer of $800,000. This price reflects a fair compromise and aligns closely with the value you see in the product. We hope this proposal will facilitate a successful transaction.
